title: # 477 - Ms. Pat, LeeAnn Kreischer & ME
description:
Today, I sit down with comedian Ms. Pat and my wife LeeAnn. We talk about the making of “The Ms. Pat Show”, The Cabin, Kaley Cuoco, DaBaby, game changers in Hip-Hop, and much more! 

 

For the rest of the podcast with Ms. Pat and LeeAnn, go to Wife of the Party Podcast on iTunes or on YouTube here: https://youtu.be/rDRuZXa61Ys 

 

Ms. Pat has a new show premiering August 12th on BET+ called “The Ms. Pat Show” 

 

Check out Ms. Pat’s podcast “The Patdown Podcast” wherever you get yours! 

 

This episode is brought to you by Stat Hero. Sign up for free at http://www.stathero.com/Bertcast and get a 300% match!

 

This episode is also brought to you by Noom. Sign up for your trial today at http://www.noom.com/bertcast   

 

This episode is also brought to you by 3CHi. Go to http://www.3chi.com and use the code “BERT” at checkout for 5% off your order.

 

This episode is also brought to you by Birddogs. Enter promo code “BERT” and get a free Whistle Tip Football at http://www.birddogs.com  

 

This episode is also brought to you by Helix Sleep. Go to http://www.helixsleep.com/bert to get $200 off all mattress orders and 2 free pillows! 

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com 

Twitter: http://www.Twitter.com/bertkreischer 

Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer 

Instagram: http://www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer 

Youtube: http://www.Youtube.com/user/Akreischer
